attributes.action: give the Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) the right to impound airline staff records
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under EU Regulation 261/2004 airlines are claiming staff sickness as an extraordinary circumstance to avoid paying compensation. There is much suspicion that airlines are claiming flights are being cancelled because of sickness even when this is not the true reason. The CAA should be given the right to impound and examine airline staff records to check if the claim is true.
